riddle: I beep and I boop, I roll and I glide. In Galaxy's Edge, I'll stand by your side. Choose my head, my legs, my core. What am I you'll build and adore?
description: Let's head to Hollywood Studios. Surprise! This has been the hardest secret to keep. We're building you a Droid at 11:30AM!

riddle: In a cargo bay where the rebels eat. You'll find your fill and grab a seat. Star Wars fare on a galactic tray, where are we dining midday?
description: Now we can take your new amigo and feed him some purple sauce

riddle: You'll dodge and dive through jumps of light, with Chewie growling left and right. Aboard the Falcon, hold on tight. What famous ship takes off in flight?
description: You will be pilot. Let's go to standby for Smuggler's Run!

riddle: It starts with a mouse and a train gone wild. A zany ride, both cute and styled. Through cartoon chaos, twist and sway, what runaway ride leads the way?
description: Lightning Lane time! I booked us on Runaway Railway for 1:30PM

riddle: Through hyperspace, we twist and fly. One tour, random - no telling why. A 3D Thrill with droids in tow, what's the name of this space show?
description: Your little Droid amigo is going on his first flight! We can hop on at a dentist's favorite time

riddle: Lightning flashes, the hallway fades. An elevator drops through spooky shades. Check in and scream - it's quite the tale. What hotel ride will make you wail?
description: Maybe not Star Wars themed, but we're still having a great day focusing on you. Our last ride before your next surprise, Lightning Lane at 3:55PM

riddle: We'll leave the studios, up we go. Over rooftops, nice and slow. A gondola in the sky so high, what ride takes us as we fly?
description: It's time to park hop â€” let's take the Skyliner to Epcot!

riddle: Music blasts and planets spin. A cosmic chase you'll soon begin. At quarter to five, it's time to rock - which ride's our intergalatic shock?
description: Surprise! I got us a Lightning Lane for Guardians. We can still do standby!

riddle: Not raw, not fish, but fruity delight. Wrapped like sushi, pink and bright. In Japan it waits, a garden snack. What sweet treat will be our snack?
description: Let's grab some food from the festival, starting with Frushi and maybe a Froot Loops Shake...and cinnamon roll bites...and...

riddle: It's not a ball, though that's the claim. But climb inside, it earns its name. From cavemen to tech, this ride will teach. What sphere of knowledege will we breach?
description: Let's ride Spaceship Earth and trade some pins - we should start a collection for you!

riddle: You'll glide above the lands and seas, catch the breeze and smell the trees. From pyramids to polar bears, what global flight takes us there?
description: Remember that wedding version of the song we heard? Awww. Cute

riddle: Petals bloom and music plays, topiaries in sunlit rays. Food boths burst with vibrant hues, what fest is waiting just for you?
description: Let's spend some time just soaking in our favorite Epcot festival. I'm so thankful for a day with just you.

riddle: Mediterranean by the lake, a tapas meal, a foodie's break. Sit down and ship with views so wide. What's the name of where we'll dine?
description: Thank you for showing me my favorite genre of food. I got us a table for two.

riddle: No plans, no lines, just follow your heart. From firework shows to sweets that start. The choice is yours, what phrase unlocks your perfect night? Hint: It's our nickname for each other.
description: This day has been magical with you, now I can tell you all of our plans for the rest of the week!
